title: Stark Raving Dad
synopsis: After wearing a pink shirt to work, Homer is sent to a psychiatric ward and befriends a man who believes he is Michael Jackson.

title: Mr. Lisa Goes to Washington
synopsis: Lisa wins an essay contest and visits Washington, D.C., where she uncovers Congressman Arnold's bribery scheme.

title: When Flanders Failed
synopsis: Ned opens the Leftorium and Homer secretly wants it to fail until guilt pushes him to help save the store.

title: Bart the Murderer
synopsis: Bart becomes a mafia errand boy for Fat Tony and later panics when Principal Skinner is presumed dead.

title: Homer Defined
synopsis: Homer accidentally averts a nuclear meltdown and becomes a celebrity, then gets exposed when another crisis hits.

title: Like Father, Like Clown
synopsis: Krusty reunites with his estranged rabbi father after Bart and Lisa help broker peace between them.

title: Treehouse of Horror II
synopsis: In three Halloween stories, a monkey's paw grants twisted wishes, Mr. Burns creates a robotic Homer, and Bart terrorizes the family with psychic powers.

title: Lisa's Pony
synopsis: To make up for forgetting her recital, Homer buys Lisa a pony and works two jobs to support the expense.

title: Saturdays of Thunder
synopsis: Homer tries to bond with Bart by helping build a soapbox racer for the big derby.

title: Flaming Moe's
synopsis: Moe steals Homer's cocktail recipe and turns his tavern into the hottest bar in town, straining their friendship.

title: Burns Verkaufen der Kraftwerk
synopsis: Burns sells the power plant to German investors and Homer fears losing his cushy job after proving incompetent.

title: I Married Marge
synopsis: Homer recounts to Bart and Lisa how financial stress and an unplanned pregnancy led him and Marge to marry.

title: Radio Bart
synopsis: Bart's prank radio call for a fake boy in a well spirals out of control when Bart himself falls into a well.

title: Lisa the Greek
synopsis: Lisa's football predictions make her and Homer successful gamblers until a final pick threatens their bond.

title: Homer Alone
synopsis: Overwhelmed Marge checks into Rancho Relaxo, leaving Homer to manage the household with disastrous results.

title: Bart the Lover
synopsis: Bart catfishes Mrs. Krabappel as a fake admirer named Woodrow, then must confess and repair the damage.

title: Homer at the Bat
synopsis: Burns hires ringers for the company softball team, but absurd injuries and misfortunes sideline nearly all of them before the championship.

title: Separate Vocations
synopsis: Career aptitude tests push Bart toward police work and Lisa toward homemaking, challenging their self-image and family expectations.

title: Dog of Death
synopsis: When Santa's Little Helper needs expensive surgery, Bart takes odd jobs and later worries the recovered dog no longer loves him.

title: Colonel Homer
synopsis: Homer manages country singer Lurleen Lumpkin and must choose between fame and his marriage.

title: Black Widower
synopsis: Sideshow Bob appears reformed and marries Selma, but Bart suspects he plans to kill her for her money.

title: The Otto Show
synopsis: After losing his bus-driver job, Otto moves in with the Simpsons while trying to rebuild his life and relationship.

title: Bart's Friend Falls in Love
synopsis: Milhouse starts dating Samantha Stanky, and Bart's jealousy leads him to sabotage the relationship.

title: Brother, Can You Spare Two Dimes?
synopsis: Herb reappears bankrupt and asks Homer for help financing a new invention that could restore his fortune.
